name: Who Wants to be Alive?
description:
You have to click on the window before it will accept inputs.

Who Wants to be Alive is fast paced roguelike trivia game. You are on an exam ship that is rapidly losing power and crashing into the sun. The only way to survive is to get to the bridge of the ship and restore power, but fact-locked doors stand between you and there. Thankfully you have a phone, and a friend with a copy of Microsoft Encarta. Confer with them, answer the questions, get to the bridge, and do so quickly.

Ludum Dare link.
